sentences.english: The government has sufficient stockpiles of staples such as wheat and rice.
sentences.chinese: 印度政府的主食儲存，包括小麥和稻米，都很充足。

sentences.english: India is the world's second highest producer of rice and wheat.
sentences.chinese: 印度是世界第二大稻米和麥子的生產國。

sentences.english: During a normal season, he would plant rice after harvesting the beans.
sentences.chinese: 放在平常季節，收割大豆後他就會開始種植稻米。

sentences.english: Born in the south from staple food rice, for some strange pasta.
sentences.chinese: 生在南國自幼主食稻米，對面食有些生疏。

sentences.english: Of major benefit would be introducing different and improved rice varieties with greater salinity tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 最爲有益的做法是採用不同和改良的耐鹽鹼稻米品種。

sentences.english: The effect of glume-opening character on rice quality of early Japonica in cold region was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了寒地早粳稻裂穎性狀對稻米品質的影響。

sentences.english: SHORTAGE】The rice crop will be poor because of the shortage of the rain.
Fisk, M. C. , Whittington, J. 2010. Bayer loses fifth straight trial over US rice crops. Bloomberg Businessweek, July 14.
sentences.chinese: 拜耳丟掉了美國稻米農作物的第五次法律審判。

sentences.english: Mountain district in ZheJiang province is developing energetically green-rice production, it is established in the predominance of ecological resource.
sentences.chinese: 立足生態資源優勢，浙南山區大力發展綠色稻米生產。

sentences.english: She was pounding it in a mortar with a pestle, to separate the husks.
sentences.chinese: 她把稻米放入臼鉢裏，用杵搗着，以分離稻殼。

sentences.english: Potatoes and rice arde farinose plants.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯及稻米是富澱粉質的食物。

sentences.english: The government of Thailand, the world's largest rice exporter followed by Vietnam, has not yet limited exports.
sentences.chinese: 泰國是全世界最大的稻米出口國，越南居次。

sentences.english: Seasonal rains might destroy the rice.
sentences.chinese: 季雨可能會將稻米毀壞。

sentences.english: The region imports 71pc of its rice and 58pc of its corn.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區71%的稻米和58%的玉米都要進口。

sentences.english: The price of rice quickly doubled.
sentences.chinese: 稻米的價格很快翻了一番。

sentences.english: Grain protein content of wetness management was highest, that of water layer management was lowest.
sentences.chinese: 稻米的蛋白質含量以溼潤管理最高，水層管理最低。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
